sentences.en: A good at relax pressure , strengthen confidence and have a good effect on restraining frigidity.
sentences.cn: 放松效果绝佳,使人欢愉, 增强自信,改善性冷淡.

sentences.en: Doctor Simpson believes that Suzie 's frigidity is due to some hang - up about men.
sentences.cn: 辛普森大夫认为苏西的性冷淡是由于她对男人有着异常的精神反应。

sentences.en: Frigidity and horror have attacked that crying baby !
sentences.cn: 那位哭闹的孩子又冷又害怕。

sentences.en: Frigidity and horror have frozen this crying baby!
sentences.cn: 寒冷恐惧将这哭僵的孩子凝冻!

sentences.en: HYDRANGEA - Thank You For Understanding , Frigidity, Heartlessness.
